document_data.name: ''Deepfire Liniment''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Deepfire liniment''''' was a type of [[oil]]-based external medicine used to relieve stiffness, aches, and pains of old wounds.
document_data.History: ''Circa'' [[1348 DR]], [[Maglor]] the Apothecary, secretly an agent from [[Zhentil Keep]], in the town of [[Eveningstar]] of [[Cormyr]], concocted medicines for the locals, including ''deepfire liniments''. One of his regular clients was an old warrior named [[Beldrak]], who used ''deepfire liniments'' to soothe his old aching wounds.
